channel.title: CVE Feed for Symantec Corporation -- Norton Identity Safe for Android
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Symantec Corporation -- Norton Identity Safe for Android

item.title: CVE-2018-12240|2024-08-05T08:30:59.391Z -- symantec%20corporation -- norton%20identity%20safe%20for%20android
item.description: The Norton Identity Safe product prior to 5.3.0.976 may be susceptible to a privilege escalation issue via a hard coded IV, which is a type of vulnerability that can potentially increase the likelihood of encrypted data being recovered without adequate credentials.
